p: A total of 11 good- and 11 non-responders were available to validate the top discovery results. Cohort characteristics were broadly similar to the discovery cohort with a minor difference in the mean baseline DAS28 (good-responders, mean = 6.27; non-responders, mean = 5.33; p = 0.0005). Relative quantification was used to compare expression between baseline and 3 months of adalimumab treatment for both response groups (Fig. 1). In good-responders differential expression was validated for 17 transcripts in the same direction of change as the initial discovery cohort (fold change > 1.2, FDR p < 0.05; Table 3). In the equivalent analysis of non-responders, no transcripts were differentially expressed at a significant level.
